flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=180>>180 RSVP
Of those only 180*0.8=<<180*0.8=144>>144 people showed up
So only 144-10=<<144-10=314>>314 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 134.0, not 314.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
